Paragraph: Smaller domain sizes in the active blend layer could afford a short exciton diffusion length , which is desirable to suppress the recombination loss.

| active blend layer |

(Note: In this case, "active blend layer" is the only expression that could potentially refer to a material or material component. Other terms like "domain sizes" and "exciton diffusion length" are not material names, but properties or characteristics of materials.)
